Example Project: Building a Virtualized Home Lab

Published on: November 09, 2025 | Status: IN_PROGRESS

Key Competencies: Virtualization Networking Security

This is a short introduction to the project. We will be building a home lab from scratch using Proxmox for virtualization, pfSense for routing and firewall, and several virtual machines to host various services. The goal is to create a stable, secure, and well-documented environment for testing and learning.
